name: Alfred Krzywicki
content: Staff Directory | Dr Alfred Krzywicki Ã— Search University staff directory Login Dr Alfred Krzywicki Position Lecturer Org Unit Computer Science Email alfred.krzywicki@adelaide.edu.au Telephone 831 31103 Location Floor/Room 4.37 , Ingkarni Wardli , North Terrace View My Researcher Profile Biography/ Background Dr Alfred Krzywicki obtained his PhD at School of Computer Science, The University of New South Wales in 2012. His postdoctoral research at the same school included a number of application areas: Natural Language Processing, Recommender Systems for People-to-People recommendation, and Time Series Forecasting for Social and Political Science. His current research focus is Natural Language Processing, especially online text analytics. His recent research project is in Time Series Pattern Mining. His teaching at the University of Adelaide include Natural Language Processng, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning courses. The information in this directory is provided to support the academic, administrative and business activities of the University of Adelaide.
